metadata.title: moby: external DNS requests from 'internal' networks could lead to data exfiltration (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A vulnerability was found in Moby due to excessive data output in external DNS requests from "internal" networks, enabling unauthorized access to sensitive system information by remote attackers. This flaw allows attackers to gain access to sensitive information by exploiting incorrect resource transfer between spheres through specially crafted requests.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
cri-tools is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
